name: Linewise Absent Count
query:
SELECT   
        `tabProject`.territory As "Territory::100",
        `tabProject`.customer As "Customer::100",
	`tabProject`.name As "Project:Link/Project:150", 
        `tabTask`.subject AS "Subject::150", 
	`tabTask`.name AS "Task Id:Link/Task:100",
	`tabTask`.r1_count AS "Vacancies::60",
        `tabTask`.r7_count AS "Sourced/Submitted::70",
        `tabTask`.exp_start_date AS "Expected Start Date::120",
        `tabTask`.exp_end_date AS "Expected End Date :: 120",
         datediff(date(current_date),(exp_start_date)) AS "Age(days)::70",
        `tabTask`.status AS "Task Status::120",
        `tabTask`._assign AS "Assigned To::610"
FROM
 	`tabTask`
	INNER JOIN `tabProject` ON `tabTask`.project=`tabProject`.name
WHERE
	`tabProject`.status in ('Open','Overdue','DnD') AND
	`tabTask`.status in ('Open','Working','Pending Review','Overdue');
